content:
Generally the issue is antivirus programs that are helping you. Personally I can not make the auto configuration wizard work with the Nortons product, other offer rather patchy results. Nortons can be relied on to make sure no settings are ever detected.

You might try pressing the advanced config button and manually entering the settings for your account.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I already disable the anti-virus but still not working. what to put in advance config?
creator: janpaulopilongco

content:
What is your full version number?

Please start Windows in safe mode with networking enabled - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12376/windows-10-start-your-pc-in-safe-mode

Still In Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem go away?

content: The problem went away but when I restarted the computer in normal mode it was still happening.

content: Have you tried turning off global indexing at settings>general? I don't know if that would resolve your issue, but might be worth trying.

content: Turning off the global indexing didn't seem to do anything. Still refusing the get the messages on request.
creator: wadetritschler

content:
Senza contesto non saprei che dirti. Le prestazioni di Thunderbird dipendono da molte cose. Dalle caratteristiche dell'hardware anzitutto. Dalla dimensione dell'archivio di posta. Dall'eventuale effetto di rallentamento dovuto all'antivirus. Etc.

Prova a vedere se in Modalità risoluzione dei problemi le cose migliorano -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/modalita-risoluzione-problemi-thunderbird
creator: @next

content: Uh, forgot to include screenshot.
creator: mortenlarsen

content: Omit the password. That is the issue.
creator: davidsk

content: No immediate solution on that. First, I suggest you click view>folders to see what is checked. Setting more than one option could be the cause of that, such as, 'all folders' and 'unified folders.'
creator: davidsk

content: There is significant overhead in transferring data between IMAP accounts. One possible item to try would be changing the setting of mailnews.tcptimeout from 100 to 300 or whatever might work. You can do that at settings>general and scroll down to config editor.
creator: davidsk

content: This message indicates that either the username is wrong or the password is wrong. I believe comcast requires app passwords. More info at https://www.xfinity.com/support/articles/third-party-email-access
creator: davidsk

content: Maybe the email was deleted automatically? Please also see this discussion: https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/outlook_com/forum/all/outlook-sends-not-read-receipts-from-empty-outbox/4e428dec-4cb2-4f50-9f22-a52842bac853
creator: shopov.bogomil

content:
I don't think that's all. I got the "Not Read" message 11 times for the same email and then, finally, got a message to say the email had been read and I got a reply! So it seems that, despite the reply, my original email was NOT deleted. Here's what they said:

"Your message 

  To: XXXXXXXXXX   Subject: Fwd: Customer Contact   Sent: Thursday, February 29, 2024 11:08:34 AM (UTC+00:00) Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London 
was deleted without being read on Thursday, February 29, 2024 3:28:46 PM (UTC+00:00) Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London.

Final-recipient: RFC822; XXXXXXXXX@XXXXXXXXX.com Disposition: automatic-action/MDN-sent-automatically; deleted X-MSExch-Correlation-Key: CWV24gPelkyuoeOQSyg6Lg== Original-Message-ID: <0de4b2cf-e67a-49d9-a7b5-9eeb670356a8@btinternet.com> X-Display-Name: XXXXXXXXXX

So, what caused the email to be marked as "automatically deleted" (when it wasn't).


I've only had this problem with 2 email addresses; 1 is from a UK hospital and the other from a large UK car dealership. It's strange that it happens VERY intermittently. I'm sure it's something or someone at the receiving end who's done something but I don't have a clue what!
creator: steve.uprichard

content:
Mi sembra che altri abbiano segnalato lo stesso problema ma non se ne sia venuti a capo perché il problema si presenta in modo apparentemente casuale e non se ne riesce quindi ad individuare la causa.

Che io sappia non ci sono neppure estensioni a questo scopo.

Se vuoi, puoi chiedere altre opinioni o suggerimenti anche su https://forum.mozillaitalia.org
creator: @next

content: Grazie della risposta, adesso so che non sono io a non sapere settare la nuova versione. E' un problema grave, per me,anche molto fastidioso ed irritante. Inoltre, forse ancora piu' grave, ho un'altro problema, all'avvio al mattino, scarica sempre tutte le cartelle (a me non sembra lo faccia in contemporanea con le sottocartelle), ma un giorno su due, all'avvio al mattino, devo aspettare alcuni/molti minuti perche' non ho piu' i vecchi messaggi nelle cartelle e devo attendere che vengano scaricati tutti dal server (spesso 7-8k messaggi per cartella!!). Se in ditta, con il server a pochi metri e una LAN GBit posso attendere, sul Notebook a casa e' assolutamente impossibile. Infatti, su tutti i devices portatili ho re-installato la versione 102 e ho intenzione di farlo anche in ditta. Sara' possibile avere informazioni sui tempi per ottenere le correzioni di questi veramente irritanti 'bug'? Grazie! PS - adesso chiedo anche sul forum mozzilaitalia!
creator: sandro.montagni

content:
Sui tempi non saprei. Questo è solo un forum per gli utenti.

La segnalazione di bug andrebbe fatta su bugzilla bugzilla.mozilla.org
creator: @next

content: Ok. Grazie!

content:
Non è un problema. Se ne è parlato recentemente qui -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/questions/1440822

La password principale serve a proteggere l'accesso all'account, non la posta già scaricata. Ti impedisce di scaricare la nuova posta e ti impedisce di leggere la password di accesso alla casella di posta memorizzata in Thunderbird.
creator: @next

content: Ho visto casi simili e per la mia esperienza si tratta di mail inviate senza data o con una intestazione data non standard. Per saperne di più però bisognerebbe analizzare le intestazioni dei messaggi problematici.
creator: @next

content:
Se, come sembra, gli account sono di tipo IMAP assicurati anzitutto di avere spazio a disposizione sul server.

Se non è questo il problema, allora la questione riguarda le impostazioni locali del profilo. Hai fatto una configurazione da zero o una migrazione da altro PC? Sul computer è presente un antivirus di terze parti? Hai lo stesso problema anche in Modalità risoluzione dei problemi? -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/modalita-risoluzione-problemi-thunderbird
creator: @next

content: I have had good success with the addon, Dark Reader, to manage the message content pane. It provides consistency with the dark theme.
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks, David. Are you saying TB settings can't fix this? Is it a bug, or does it need an enhancement?
creator: hmkabaker

content: I'm saying that the dark theme from thunderbird, plus the DarkReader addon, provide a good theme for black with white text.
creator: davidsk

content: I went to the Dark Reader site, read their info and skimmed through recent reviews. I won't use it because: 1. It's designed for Firefox, not for Thunderbird. I'm happy with Firefox as it is. I'm concerned about forwarding and responding to emails that apparently have some coding that offends the Thunderbird display machine. 2. Too many recent reviewers complain about excessive resource consumption, raising core temperature and slowing down the Firefox browser, sometimes to a crawl, causing Firefox to recommend turning off extensions. Glad it's working for you, and thanks for offering help.
creator: hmkabaker

content:
Update: In case it wasn't obvious, this is a problem when using Thunderbird's Automatic or Dark theme.(Settings | Add-ons and Themes | Themes)

So I enabled Light theme, and while I need to get used to the glare of constant White background and dark text, the problem is solved.
creator: hmkabaker

content:
The question here is why is it still running and not responding?

It sounds like something is causing the application to hang when you exit. Please check in task manager to see if there is already a process running before you click the link. That will at least start the diagnostic process as to what is happening.
creator: MattAuSupport
